title: "6 Skills Writers Need To Hone Amid The AI Boom"
excerpt: "While AI is an impressive generalist with a solid base of knowledge across many domains, these models can't easily acquaint themselves with the intricacies of specific workplaces and fields of research. The writers best positioned to thrive in the AI boom are writers with specialized, industry-specific knowledge."
